tactics.name: Niche Category Selection
tactics.description: Choose specific subcategories over broad niches to reduce competition and improve ranking potential
steps: Select a niche (e.g., business and money)
Filter to specific categories (e.g., management and leadership)
Verify category relevance to book content
caveats: Avoid misrepresenting category relevance to avoid Amazon penalties
source_quotes: instead of business and money you can select the management and leadership category

heuristics.name: Sales Target Benchmarking
heuristics.condition: If category sales targets are excessively high, prioritize alternative niches
source_quotes: two thousand six hundred ninety seven copies of e-books to reach number one

claims.statement: KDP rankings require 2,697 ebook sales to achieve #1 in the business and money category
source_quotes: two thousand six hundred ninety seven eBook copies sold in order to take that number one spot

niche_patterns.example: business and money + high competition + 2,697 sales
niche_patterns.description: Identify niches with clear sales targets for ranking strategy
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Quantifies ranking difficulty for targeted publishing strategies
source_quotes: two thousand six hundred ninety seven eBook copies sold
